comments.author: Fullcoinese
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on January 23, 2023, 03:54:51 PM2. Is it possible to invest very very big money like 10's of billions without been tracked by authorities or is it not possible to earn or invest this amount by illegal businessnot impossible, but it's too risky when you live where your country does not legalize the ownership of Bitcoin and other crypto assets.you will also need support for converting your Bitcoins to your fiat currency. it may be difficult for the authorities to track down asset ownership if you are not connected to a centralized exchange. but a transaction of that size would certainly be a concern for authorities when you deposit your fiat to buy Bitcoins.but given your situation, it would be better if you didn't take this big risk.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Bitcoin is an authentically decentralized cryptocurrency. So there is no reason to prevents from accumulating Bitcoin, regardless of the amount. It cannot be traced unless you share your address with another person. Or, even better, use a reputable Bitcoin mixer. When you store your Bitcoin in a non-custodial wallet or a hardware wallet, the government cannot intervene because they cannot regulate it. Only the Blockchain data can reveal which addresses are holding how much Bitcoin. But can't figure out who it is.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: knowing how much money went through bitcoin is impossiblewatching exchange trade volume is meaningless. someone can arbitrage the same 1btc in a multi currency hop loop multiple times to multiply volumelooking for exchange deposit and withdrawals dont correlate to actual market order listings/exchanging. it can just be custodian holds for a different time/pricecomparing satoshi's stash of 1m coins at $0.001-$0.01each to say all of michael saylors trade dates of his 135k coin.. to say grayscales trust deposit dates. brings such a random average that it becomes meaningless of any precise figure that its not even worth trying to gather such known entities acquisitionsusing UTXO age does not correlate to peoples fiat trades, its just their wallet shuffling dates which could be movements for a variety of reasons and not trading against fiat when utxo dates moveand no before you dare suggest it. no market cap is not a representation of some hoard of fiat.. its just a math number of a single order of any amount calculated /multiplied against all coins of circulation. totally meaningless

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: To find out how much money you have invested in bitcoin, you can make a journal that contains the date and amount of fiat money you used to invest. Or you can use Excel, which provides columns that you can fill in with the date and amount of money and how many bitcoins you bought.That will make it easier to track how much money you have used. I usually do it that way and it really helps to know my total investment in fiat money. From there, I can find out the temporary profit position that I have got.If bitcoin is legally accepted in your country, it may be okay to invest 10 billion. But if not, your bank will suspect it and will investigate. My advice, do this regularly every week or month in the amount you can afford.
